actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions.

summary.text: Allows a charitable tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for contributions to an organization which on or before May 26, 1969, operated and maintained as its principal purpose the maintainance of long-term care, comfort, or education of permanently and totally disabled persons, elederly persons, needy widows, or children.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions.
